title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Linking Informal Learning and Organizational Citizenship Behavior: Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: The influence of three learning environment dimensions (learning facilitation, learning respect, error avoidance) on informal learning can be explained
The mediating mechanism by which informal learning activities lead to organizational citizenship behavior (OCB) can be analyzed
Three or more informal learning strategies applicable to practical work settings can be designed using mobile microlearning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
